Welcome to TIVA/TCI!

class tivatci.Model(name=None, age=30, sex='F', weight=60, height=160, v1=None, k10=0, k12=0, k13=0, k21=0, k31=0, v2=0, v3=0, q1=0, q2=0, q3=0, ke0=0)

Bases: object

__init__(name=None, age=30, sex='F', weight=60, height=160, v1=None, k10=0, k12=0, k13=0, k21=0, k31=0, v2=0, v3=0, q1=0, q2=0, q3=0, ke0=0)

set the model parameters based on the name of the model and the patient time constants are always in min^-1

__repr__()

Return repr(self).

ce(tmax=None, dose=None, a=None, ke0=None)

calculate the effect site concentration

cp(tmax=None, dose=None, a=None)

calculate the plasma concentration

recalc_ke0(tpeak)

find optimal ke0 that minimize the difference between the estimated tpeak and the actual tpeak tpeak: the actual time to reach the maximum effect in seconds returns: the optimal ke0 in /min

run(cts, filename=None, maxrate=None, plasma=False)

simulate the movement of drug amount in the compartments returns: DataFrame of Ct, Cp, Ce, and Rate

setk(v1=0, k10=0, k12=0, k13=0, k21=0, k31=0, ke0=0)

set PK/PD parameters of the model

setq(v1=0, v2=0, v3=0, q1=0, q2=0, q3=0, ke0=0)
sim(tmax=None, dose=None, a=None, ke0=None)

simulate the movement of drug amount in the compartments tmax: maximum time in seconds for simulation (if None, do while the maximum Ce is reached) dose: infused amount at every second ([1] for bolus at time 0, [1] * 10 for infusion for 10 sec, etc.) ke0: the elimination rate from the effect site (if None, use the self.ke0) a: initial state of the compartments returns: the estimated amount of drugs in the compartments in the shape (tmax, 4)

tci(ct, a=None, plasma=False)

calculate the infusion rate to achieve the desired effect site concentration using the Shafer and Greg algorithm a: the initial state of the compartments ct: target concentration

tpeak(ke0=None, prec=1)

estimate the time to reach the maximum effect site concentration ke0: the elimination rate from the effect site (if None, use the self.ke0) prec: the precision of the time in seconds

udf(plasma=False)

generate the unit disposition function (UDF) for the plasma or the effect site

v1_v4 = 1000
tivatci.calc_lbm(sex, weight, height, age=None, model='james')
